Components Contact

Button

Usage

import { button } from "../../src/components/index.js";

button({
    children,
    variant = 'filled', // filled, outlined, subtle, ghost
    size = 'md', // sm, md, lg
    shape = 'squared', // squared, rounded, pill, square, circle
    href,
    target = '_self',
    type, // i.e. submit
    ariaLabel,
    classList: cList,
})

Props

variant

filled

outlined

subtle

ghost

shape

squared

rounded

pill

square

circle

size

small

medium

large
